mosinstall.name: Table - Content Category
mosinstall.author: Joomla! Project
mosinstall.copyright: (C) 2005 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
mosinstall.description: Shows a Table view of Content items for a particular Category

param.name: menu_image
param.label: Menu Image
param.description: A small image to be placed to the left or right of your menu item, images must be in images/stories/

param.name: page_title
param.label: Page Title
param.description: Show/Hide the pages Title

param.name: pageclass_sfx
param.label: Page Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css classes of the page, this allows individual page styling

param.name: back_button
param.label: Back Button
param.description: Show/Hide a Back Button, that returns you to the previously view page

param.name: orderby
param.label: Order by
param.description: This overrides the ordering of the items.

param.name: date_format
param.label: Date Format
param.description: The format of the date displayed, using PHPs strftime Command Format - if left blank it will load the format from your language file

param.name: date
param.label: Date Column
param.description: Show/Hide the Date column

param.name: author
param.label: Author Column
param.description: Show/Hide the Author column

param.name: hits
param.label: Hits Column
param.description: Show/Hide the Hits column

param.name: headings
param.label: Table Headings
param.description: Show/Hide the Table Headings

param.name: navigation
param.label: Navigation Bar
param.description: Show/Hide the Navigation bar

param.name: order_select
param.label: Order Select
param.description: Show/Hide the Order Select dropdown

param.name: display
param.label: Display Select
param.description: Show/Hide the Display Select dropdown

param.name: display_num
param.label: Display Number
param.description: Number of items to be displayed by default

param.name: filter
param.label: Filter
param.description: Show/Hide the Filter ability

param.name: filter_type
param.label: Filter Field
param.description: Which field shall the filter apply to

param.name: other_cat
param.label: Other Categories
param.description: Show/Hide the listing of other Categories

param.name: empty_cat
param.label: Empty Categories
param.description: Show/Hide empty(no items) categories

param.name: cat_items
param.label: # Category Items
param.description: Show/Hide the number of items in each category

param.name: cat_description
param.label: Category Description
param.description: Show/Hide the Category Description, it will appear below the Category Name
